name: MDLTextureChannelEncoding
desc: Options for the data size and type of texel channel values, used by the channelEncoding property.

items.name: case uInt8
items.desc: Each channel value per texel is an 8-bit unsigned integer.

items.name: case uInt16
items.desc: Each channel value per texel is a 16-bit unsigned integer.

items.name: case uInt24
items.desc: Each channel value per texel is a 24-bit unsigned integer.

items.name: case uInt32
items.desc: Each channel value per texel is a 32-bit unsigned integer.

items.name: case float16
items.desc: Each channel value per texel is a 16-bit floating-point value.

items.name: case float32
items.desc: Each channel value per texel is a 32-bit floating-point value.
